item.description:
# OSX\Linux Notice Autoupdate might be broken in previous versions, if that is the case please download manually (fixed in at least >= 1.24.90)
## Current Release Notes * Fix Victoria 3 import and mod type indicators. If you end up with duplicate mod entries right click on installed mods area and select Delete all and Reload (backup your mod collections first) * Make Irony able to locate mods with differently named descriptors but still pointing towards the same path
## 1.24.103 Release Notes * Make more aggressive memory cleanup once navigating back from conflict solver * Add experimental native linux wayland support (see appSettings.json) * Add alternate titlebars (off by default see appSettings.json) * Bump dependencies * Fix compress merge failing due to bad file listing including directories * Various fixes & changes
## Release Notes 1.24 * Update dependencies * Handle replace path in basic mod merge * Bypass steam thinking that Irony is a game host process (valve should seriously tweak logic of theirs) * Add conflict solver modes which skip localization * Write last known Irony location to %appdata% directory so other programs can find it * Add support for metadata descriptor type games (Victoria 3 support) * Add option to ignore update * Improve mod loading performance
